prompts: Create a small, playful fire-type Pokemon that resembles a piglet with a curly tail.
I want a cute Pokemon with orange fur and a cheerful expression, perfect for a starter.
Generate a fire-type creature with distinctive black ears and a round face for a new game.
Make a Pokemon that embodies warmth and friendliness with a focus on fiery abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a strong connection to nature and loves to run in fields.
Design a playful fire-type Pokemon with a unique tail and a love for adventure.
Show me a Pokemon that stands out with its vibrant colors and energetic personality.
